item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a Fellow in European Politics at the London School of Economics and Political Science’s European Institute, where I teach the courses ‘Democracy, Ideology and the European State’ and ‘The Future: Political Responses to a Challenge’.

item.title: Academic Publications
item.description: Bellamy, R., S. Kröger, and M. Lorimer (2021) ‘Party Views on Differentiated Integration’, Comparative European Politics, DOI 10.

item.title: Education
item.description: 2015-2019 PhD in European Studies, European Institute, London School of Economics.

item.title: Public Engagement
item.description: Blog Posts ‘Europe in far-right ideology’, Blog Post, Ideology, Theory, Practice (August 2021)

item.title: Teaching
